name: 洛秋 Fall Autumn
description:
Introduction

Fall autumn is an ARPG game, which is developed and produced by fishing in winter. The game uses an overhead world.
There are several forces in the world. Players will play Qiu Yu and his teammates to perform tasks together

Game features
Gorgeous attack: easy to operate, easy to hit Combo
Air combo: support air attack and release skill
Dodge system: after dodge successfully, the enemy cannot move
